title: "Artificial intelligence in war: Human judgment as an organizational strength and a strategic liability"
excerpt: "Artificial intelligence has the potential to change the conduct of war. Recent excitement about AI is driven by advances in the ability to infer predictions from data. Yet this does not necessarily mean that machines can replace human decision makers."
